mdes.slick.sui.event
Class ControllerEvent

java.lang.Object
  mdes.slick.sui.event.EventObject
      mdes.slick.sui.event.ControllerEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ControllerEvent
extends EventObject

A controller event, such as button pressed or released. The button returned from getButton() is an index, starting at 1. However, if this event was due to an UP, DOWN, RIGHT, or LEFT action, the returned integer will conform to the button constants defined in this class.

Since:
b.0.2
See Also:
Serialized Form

ControllerEvent

public ControllerEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                       int id,
                       int controller,
                       int button)
Creates a new event using the specified params.

Parameters:
source - the source that created the event
id - the type of event we are dealing with (BUTTON_PRESSED or BUTTON_RELEASED)
controller - the controller
button - the button
